mean_cn: n. 毕业文凭，奖状；  vt. 发给…毕业文凭
mean_en: a document which shows that a person has finished a course of study or has graduated from a school
word_etyma: di 二 + pl对折+oma表名词 → 对折信函 → 公文 → 毕业证书
sentence: After four years of hard work, I finally got my college diploma.
sentence_trans: 经过四年的辛勤努力，我终于拿到了大学毕业证。
